data.name: Circe's revenge
data.detailed_description:
Circe's revenge is an erotic transformational RPG game for adults.

You, as a hero sailed to an island of sorceress Circe. For long time lonely sorceress has avid sex with you and as a reward she gives you magical food. It's not easy to escape the island, because horny Circe cursed your crew and wants more sex while forcing you to eat more and more. Malicious sorceress is slowly transforming you into a pig day by day with the cunning use of sex and food. However you can escape from Circe's trap and sail away from the island. All depends on you.

Sorceress is whimsical, she demands extraordinary sexual practices, it's not easy to fulfill all of her wishes. However Circe is not the only danger that is waiting for you on the island.

Whether you will try to escape the island, or you wish to experience wild days full of sex with Circe, humiliating transformation into pig, that you will squeak with delight, inhere, that neither of paths won't be easy. Can you survive for 30 days and escape the transformation?

data.short_description: Circe's revenge is a transformative erotic RPG game for adults. The protagonist is sexually transformed into a pig by the witch Circe. Can you survive 30 days and escape the transformation?
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Bulgarian, Danish, Finnish, Dutch, Japanese, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Czech, Greek, Swedish, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 3D support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for ADULTS only and may include explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive.
The game includes: Sexual comments and lewd situations, full nudity, strong language, straight and gay and bisexual sexual content, fantasy sexual situations, transformation sexual scen, mild humiliation.
